piiksuma.database

Class Mapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • piiksuma.database.Mapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Mapped class type. Used to check asigments when returning query results.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeleteMapper, InsertionMapper, QueryMapper, UpdateMapper 

    public abstract class Mapper<T>
extends Object
    Common functionality between all the Mapper Classes.
    Author:
    luastan, CardamaS99, danimf99, alvrogd, OswaldOswin1, Marcos-marpin

    • Method Detail

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection()

      • setConnection

        public void setConnection(Connection connection)

      • fkValue

        protected Object fkValue(Object forKeyObject)
                  throws IllegalAccessException
        Extracts the Primary Key value from a given object
        Parameters:
        forKeyObject - Object to be extracted the value from. Normally corresponding to a foreign key object
        Returns:
        Object's Primary Key value
        Throws:
        IllegalAccessException - In case of being unable to grab the field value

      • createUpdate

        public Mapper<T> createUpdate(String update)
        Allows an update to be specified whith SQL.
        Parameters:
        update - String with the SQL code to be used in the update
        Returns:
        The current Mapper instance

      • executeUpdate

        public void executeUpdate()
        Executes the update whith the previously asigned parameters.

      • getFK

        protected Object getFK(Class<?> clase,
                       Object pkObject)
        Queries a foreign key and maps it automatically
        Parameters:
        clase - Class to be looped over
        pkObject - Object used as a parameter within the query to find the tuple in the database
        Returns:
        Mapped instance from the query result set. When the class isn't annotated with MapperTable returns null.

      • defineClass

        public Mapper<T> defineClass(Class<? extends T> mappedClass)
        Defines the Class to be used when mapping the subsequent query results
        Parameters:
        mappedClass - Class for the results to be mapped to
        Returns:
        The mapper instance

      • defineParameters

        public Mapper<T> defineParameters(Object... parametros)
        Defines the parameters to be inserted in the PreparedStatement
        Parameters:
        parametros - Parameter list to be inserted in the statement in the same order as the parametes where passed
        Returns:
        The mapper instance
